original_text: My Christian friends, I will use an example from our lives. Two people may make an agreement together and they both agree to it properly. If they do that, nobody else can change that agreement. They cannot take away its authority.
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 사람의 예대로 말하노니 사람의 언약이라도 정한 후에는 아무도 폐하거나 더하거나 하지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: I will use an example from our lives
Two people may make an agreement together
sentences.korean_translation: 두 사람이 함께 계약을 맺을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: and they both agree to it properly
nobody else can change that agreement
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그 계약을 변경할 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: They cannot take away its authority
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 권위를 빼앗을 수 없습니다
